text: There are movies where we are interested in seeing people's lives without agreeing with what they're doing.
author: Natalie Portman

text: I never gave up on country music because I knew what I was doing was not that bad.
author: Willie Nelson

text: I'd like a male to listen to my music and find it kind of fascinating, what a girl goes through when they get heartbroken or get sad or get hurt by something.
author: Ellie Goulding

text: A lot of country music is sad.
author: Willie Nelson

text: I could always sing, from a really young age, but my voice was really weird. I used to make my mum turn up the radio every day in our house. She was well into music so I got that from her.
author: Ellie Goulding
